TopicTitle: no tech for oxygen ksp rss ro rp0

Articles.Content:
hello,

 

i'm stuck in my ro career because i can't add oxygen to the servicemodule tank in the ui menu. it just says: no tech for oxygen. but when i go in to sandbox it is available for the same tank.

problem is there is no way to research or to unlock this to my knowledge. 

 

please help :$
You need to unlock Crew Survivability in the tech tree. That should then unlock oxygen for service modules.
